RICHLOOKS MAKEUP STUDIO

Rich Looks Makeup Studio is one of India’s leading hair & beauty salon in Delhi. It is promoted by Gulshan Idrish, a touch of bollywood renowned makeup artist who started operating the company for 15 years. We are the leading chain in the hair and beauty serving that is having famous family salons in New Delhi. We provides a complete solution with fulfill dreams to any clients looking to stage show from the initial concept to the end result. We also provide make-up looks FPR Theatrical, Television, Films, Fashion Magazines, Fashion Shows, Wedding Programmes, Professional Photo Shoot, Parties and other similarity production’s including all aspects of the world.

The Perfect Awards

Bring back memories

We have a various range of artistic efficiency doing everything from high trend to basic beauty. We are one of the best professional bridal beauty parlor in Delhi.

If you would like to be a beautiful bride, then go with the magical touch of Mr. Gulshan Idrish. We take care of every minor thing like wedding hairdos to nails and sari draping. If you are looking for a perfect party makeup artist in Delhi, then Rich Looks Makeup Studio is the best choice. We have already done bridal make-up of numbers of brides.
